reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, well-made, and super soft, feeling comfortable against the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I loved this sweater. It’s modern, sexy, and at the same time very comfortable. The V-neck design with the twisted knot gives it a unique touch that really flatters the figure. The fabric has a nice thickness, it’s soft and pleasant to the touch, not rough or cheap. The long sleeves make it perfect for cooler days, but since it’s cropped, it also works great for a more youthful and casual look. The size fit me well, it’s snug without being uncomfortable, and it’s very flattering. Definitely a versatile piece you can wear both for a casual outing or a slightly more dressed-up look. Read more
items.author: Yousi Claro

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy
items.body: Very soft and nice material.i will order more colors.Cute with a tank top underneath. I ordered a size small and is oversized but adorable. Read more
items.author: Elin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars More cropped and revealing than you'd think
items.body: True to style and color, excellent quality and thickness. The only complaints i have are that the cut of the neckline and bottom hem are a lot lower (neckline)/higher(bottom) than pictured, which is disappointing because I'm busty and have a bit of a belly so i feel it runs a bit small. This is more of a cropped style sweater than anticipated or that I believed it to be based on the photo. The only way I wear it is if I have a bodysuit on underneath and even then I feel naked. I would suggest either being a twig or buying one a size bigger and wearing a tank top underneath. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute
items.body: Super comfy and soft material. True to size Read more
items.author: angie sund

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute! But questionable quality
items.body: Received my sweater yesterday. It is exactly what I was hoping it was! And surprisingly really soft which was an added bonus. Giving three stars since there was an extremely noticeable pull in the front right out of packaging. I ordered white which made it even more noticeable. Debating on ordering a darker color to hide future pulls in fabric but can’t justify the price knowing it will pull that easily Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it!!
items.body: Nice, but ended up shrinking too much and didn't lay good after that. I only wore it a couple of times and then got rid of it. Read more
items.author: LaM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great!
items.body: Absolutely fabulous! I love it. It fits perfectly and looks great. Im ordering other colors Read more
items.author: Brenda Greenblatt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Love the looks! Fit is a tad oversized but not by much! It’s thick and washes great! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Chocolate, Cuban Sand, Black and White, Black, Light Blue, Rose Red, Haze Blue, White, Beige, Flaxen, Chestnut, Dark Forest Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
